content.text:
# Estadio Monumental Chihuahua

| opened      = 2005
| capacity    = 14,500
| tenants     = Dorados de Chihuahua
}}
Estadio Monumental Chihuahua is a stadium in Chihuahua, Mexico. It is primarily used for baseball, and is the home field of the Dorados de Chihuahua baseball team of the Mexican League.  It holds 14,500 people and opened in 2005.
In 2010 the stadium was refurbished in order to host the Dorados de Chihuahua of the Mexican League.
